channel.title: solar on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in solar on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-27
item.description: Exclusive: This is our first look at Android 13 “Tiramisu” and some of its upcoming features (5 minute read) A source with access to a very early Android 13 build has shared screenshots showing several upcoming features and changes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-13
item.description: Tesla launches initiative to build first solar neighborhood in Austin (3 minute read) Tesla, Brookfield Asset Management, and Dacra recently announced an initiative to bring a large-scale sustainable neighborhood to Austin.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-29
item.description: TikTok’s one-night Ratatouille musical will star some of Broadway’s biggest names (2 minute read) Ratatouille: The TikTok Musical will have a lineup of Broadway’s biggest names for its January 1st streaming performance.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-11-24
item.description: Snapchat launches a TikTok-like feed called Spotlight, kick-started by paying creators (5 minute read) Spotlight is Snapchat’s new TikTok-like feed that lets users watch short, entertaining videos in a vertically scrollable video format.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.
